entry.value: books <- knime.in%%00010%%00010library(ggplot2)%%00010library(dplyr)%%00010library(DT)%%00010library(stringr)%%00010#Razliciti jezici%%00010plot1 <- books %>% %%00010 mutate(language = factor(language_code)) %>% %%00010 group_by(language) %>% %%00010 summarize(number_of_books = n()) %>% %%00010 arrange(-number_of_books) %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(reorder(language, number_of_books), number_of_books, fill = reorder(language, number_of_books))) +%%00010 geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "grey20", size = 0.35) + coord_flip() +%%00010 labs(x = "jezik", y = "broj knjiga", title = "sa engleskim jezikom") + guides(fill = FALSE)%%00010%%00010plot2 <- books %>% %%00010 mutate(language = factor(language_code)) %>% %%00010 filter(!language %in% c("en-US", "en-GB", "eng", "en-CA", "")) %>% %%00010 group_by(language) %>% %%00010 summarize(number_of_books = n()) %>% %%00010 arrange(-number_of_books) %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(reorder(language, number_of_books), number_of_books, fill = reorder(language, number_of_books))) +%%00010 geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "grey20", size = 0.35) + coord_flip() +%%00010 labs(x = "", y = "broj knjiga", title = "bez engleskog jezika") + guides(fill = FALSE)%%00010%%00010get_cor <- function(df){%%00010 m <- cor(df$x,df$y, use="pairwise.complete.obs");%%00010 eq <- substitute(italic(r) == cor, list(cor = format(m, digits = 2)))%%00010 as.character(as.expression(eq)); %%00010}%%00010%%00010plot3 <- books %>% %%00010 filter(ratings_count < 1e+5) %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(ratings_count, average_rating)) + stat_bin_hex(bins = 50) + scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Spectral") + %%00010 stat_smooth(method = "lm", color = "orchid", size = 2) +%%00010 annotate("text", x = 85000, y = 2.7, label = get_cor(data.frame(x = books$ratings_count, y = books$average_rating)), parse = TRUE, color = "orchid", size = 7)%%00010%%00010#Korelacija izmedju books_count i average_rating%%00010plot4 <- books %>% filter(books_count <= 500) %>% ggplot(aes(books_count, average_rating)) + stat_bin_hex(bins = 50) + scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Spectral") + %%00010 stat_smooth(method = "lm", color = "orchid", size = 2) +%%00010 annotate("text", x = 400, y = 2.7, label = get_cor(data.frame(x = books$books_count, y = books$average_rating)), parse = TRUE, color = "orchid", size = 7)%%00010%%00010setwd("D:/Sistemi za podrsku odlucivanju seminarski/archive")%%00010%%00010ratings <- read.csv("ratings.csv", header=T)%%00010%%00010# Ima li N/A vrijednost%%00010sapply(ratings, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))%%00010%%00010# Prazne vrijednosti, nedostajuce su ali nisu N/A nego prazni stringovi%%00010sapply(ratings, function(x) sum(x==""))%%00010%%00010##### Ciscenje podataka%%00010# Uklanjanje duplih ratinga%%00010%%00010# pretvori u data.table%%00010require(data.table)%%00010ratingsDT <- setDT(ratings)%%00010%%00010# izbaci duple ratingse%%00010library("dplyr")%%00010ratings <- distinct(ratingsDT,book_id,user_id,.keep_all = TRUE)%%00010rm(ratingsDT)%%00010%%00010# izbaci korisnike koji su ocijenili manje od 3 knjige%%00010ratings[, N := .N, .(user_id)]%%00010ratings <- ratings[N > 2]%%00010%%00010ratings$N <- NULL%%00010%%00010# smanji dataset%%00010set.seed(1)%%00010user_fraction <- 0.2%%00010users <- unique(ratings$user_id)%%00010sample_users <- sample(users, round(user_fraction * length(users)))%%00010%%00010ratings <- ratings[user_id %in% sample_users]%%00010%%00010%%00010#Korelacija izmedju number_of_rated_books i mean_rating%%00010tmp <- ratings %>% group_by(user_id) %>% summarize(mean_rating = mean(rating), number_of_rated_books = n())%%00010plot5 <- tmp %>% filter(number_of_rated_books <= 100) %>% ggplot(aes(number_of_rated_books, mean_rating)) + stat_bin_hex(bins = 50) + scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Spectral") +%%00010 stat_smooth(method = "lm", color = "orchid", size = 2, se = FALSE) + %%00010 annotate("text", x = 80, y = 1.9, label = get_cor(data.frame(x = tmp$number_of_rated_books, y = tmp$mean_rating)), color = "orchid", size = 7, parse = TRUE)%%00010%%00010%%00010#Korelacija izmedju number_of_volumes_in_series i mean_rating%%00010books %>% %%00010 filter(str_detect(str_to_lower(title), '\\(the lord of the rings')) %>% %%00010 select(book_id, title, average_rating) %>% %%00010 datatable(class="nowrap hover row-border", options = list(dom = 't',scrollX = TRUE, autoWidth = TRUE))%%00010%%00010books <- books %>% %%00010 mutate(series = str_extract(title, "\\(.*\\)"), %%00010 series_number = as.numeric(str_sub(str_extract(series, ', #[0-9]+\\)$'),4,-2)),%%00010 series_name = str_sub(str_extract(series, '\\(.*,'),2,-2));%%00010%%00010tmp <- books %>% %%00010 filter(!is.na(series_name) & !is.na(series_number)) %>% %%00010 group_by(series_name) %>% %%00010 summarise(number_of_volumes_in_series = n(), mean_rating = mean(average_rating));%%00010%%00010plot6 <- tmp %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(number_of_volumes_in_series, mean_rating)) + stat_bin_hex(bins = 50) + scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Spectral") +%%00010 stat_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, size = 2, color = "orchid") +%%00010 annotate("text", x = 35, y = 3.95, label = get_cor(data.frame(x = tmp$mean_rating, y = tmp$number_of_volumes_in_series)), %%00010 color = "orchid", size = 7, parse = TRUE);%%00010%%00010#Ispitivanje da li je nastavak u seriji bolji od originala%%00010plot7 <- books %>% %%00010 filter(!is.na(series_name) & !is.na(series_number) & series_number %in% c(1,2)) %>% %%00010 group_by(series_name, series_number) %>% %%00010 summarise(m = mean(average_rating)) %>% %%00010 ungroup() %>% %%00010 group_by(series_name) %>% %%00010 mutate(n = n()) %>% %%00010 filter(n == 2) %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(factor(series_number), m, color = factor(series_number))) +%%00010 geom_boxplot() + coord_cartesian(ylim = c(3,5)) + guides(color = FALSE) + labs(x = "Volume of series", y = "Average rating");%%00010%%00010#Ispitivanje uticaja duzine naslova na ocjenu knjige%%00010books <- books %>% %%00010 mutate(title_cleaned = str_trim(str_extract(title, '([0-9a-zA-Z]| |\'|,|\\.|\\*)*')),%%00010 title_length = str_count(title_cleaned, " ") + 1);%%00010%%00010tmp <- books %>% %%00010 group_by(title_length) %>% %%00010 summarize(n = n()) %>% %%00010 mutate(ind = rank(title_length));%%00010%%00010plot8 <- books %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(factor(title_length), average_rating, color=factor(title_length), group=title_length)) +%%00010 geom_boxplot() + guides(color = FALSE) + labs(x = "Title length") + coord_cartesian(ylim = c(2.2,4.7)) +%%00010 geom_text(aes(x = ind,y = 2.25,label = n), data = tmp);%%00010%%00010%%00010#Ispitivanje uticaja podnaslova na ocjenu knjige%%00010books <- books %>% %%00010 mutate(subtitle = str_detect(books$title, ':') * 1, subtitle = factor(subtitle));%%00010%%00010plot9 <- books %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(subtitle, average_rating, group = subtitle, color = subtitle)) + %%00010 geom_boxplot() + guides(color = FALSE);%%00010%%00010#Korelacija izmeÃ°u number_of_authors i average_rating%%00010books <- books %>% %%00010 group_by(book_id) %>% %%00010 mutate(number_of_authors = length(str_split(authors, ",")[[1]]));%%00010%%00010library(hexbin)%%00010plot10 <- books %>% filter(number_of_authors <= 10) %>% %%00010 ggplot(aes(number_of_authors, average_rating)) + stat_bin_hex(bins = 50) + scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Spectral") +%%00010 stat_smooth(method = "lm", size = 2, color = "orchid", se = FALSE) + %%00010 annotate("text", x = 8.5, y = 2.75, label = get_cor(data.frame(x = books$number_of_authors, y = books$average_rating)), color = "orchid", size = 7, parse = TRUE);%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010require(gridExtra)%%00010my_layout <- rbind(c(1,2,3,3,4,4), c(5,5,6,6,7,7), c(8,8,9,9,10,10))%%00010grid.arrange(grobs=list(plot1,plot2,plot3,plot4,plot5,plot6,plot7,plot8,plot9,plot10),layout_matrix=my_layout)

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
